questions.question: A Venture Capital firm usually has more than one VC fund
What is the main difference between equity and debt?
Just as startups have a pitch deck to pitch to numerous VCs, VCs use a pitch deck to pitch to their investors
When was the largest burst of activity in the venture capital industry witnessed?
The fundamental difference between angel investors and VCs is the size of their checks
What is meant by 'exit strategy'?
options: How the target company is planning to liquidate all investors and give them a return for their investment
How the target company plans to fire key personnel
How the target company plans to exit their target markets if they are not successful.

questions.question: VCs prefer startups with very high margins because VCs make their money by sharing in the startup's profits.
Which of the following is not a characteristic of venture capital investments?
To ensure they get the maximum amount of equity, most VC firms insist on being the only investor in a round of investing.
If a founder is offering 40% of her startup for $8M, at what price she is valuing her company, today?
